Package com.ibm.rest

Class TimeTableController

java.lang.Object
com.ibm.rest.TimeTableController
@RestController @CrossOrigin public class TimeTableController extends Object
REST controller for handling Time table-related operations.

  • Method Details

    • addTimeTable

      @PostMapping(path="/admin/timeTable/add", consumes="application/json") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> addTimeTable(@RequestBody TimeTable t) throws TimeTableAlreadyExistException
      End point for adding a new timetable. Example URL: http://localhost:8880/admin/timeTable/add
      Parameters:
      t - the timetable object to add
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with a success message and the ID of the added timetable
      Throws:
      TimeTableAlreadyExistException - if the timetable already exists

    • updateTimeTable

      @PutMapping(path="/admin/timeTable/update", consumes="application/json") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> updateTimeTable(@RequestBody TimeTable t) throws TimeTableNotFoundException
      End point for updating an existing timetable. Example URL: http://localhost:8880/admin/timeTable/update
      Parameters:
      t - the updated timetable object
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with a success message and the ID of the updated timetable
      Throws:
      TimeTableNotFoundException - if the timetable is not found

    • getAllTimeTable

      @GetMapping(path="/timeTable/all", produces="application/json") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<TimeTable>> getAllTimeTable()
      End point for retrieving all timetables. Example URL: http://localhost:8880/timeTable/all
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the list of timetables

    • getAllTimeTableByScreenId

      @GetMapping(path="/timeTable/search/screen/id/{id}", produces="application/json") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<TimeTable>> getAllTimeTableByScreenId(@PathVariable int id) throws ScreenNotFoundException
      End point for retrieving all timetables by screen ID. Example URL: http://localhost:8880/timeTable/search/screen/id/{id}
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the screen
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the list of timetables for the screen
      Throws:
      ScreenNotFoundException - if the screen is not found

    • getTimeTableByDateAndScreenId

      @PostMapping(path="/timeTable/search/dateAndScreen", consumes="application/json", produces="application/json") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<TimeTable> getTimeTableByDateAndScreenId(@RequestBody TimeTableRequest ttr) throws ScreenNotFoundException, TimeTableNotFoundException
      End point for retrieving a timetable by date and screen. Example URL: http://localhost:8880/search/dateAndScreen
      Parameters:
      ttr - the TimeTableRequest object containing date and screen ID
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the matching timetable
      Throws:
      ScreenNotFoundException - if the screen is not found
      TimeTableNotFoundException - if the timetable is not found

    • getAllTimeTableByScreenName

      @GetMapping(path="/timeTable/search/screen/name/{name}", produces="application/json") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<TimeTable>> getAllTimeTableByScreenName(@PathVariable String name) throws ScreenNotFoundException
      End point for retrieving all timetables by screen name. Example URL: http://localhost:8880/timeTable/search/screen/name/{name}
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the screen
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the list of timetables for the screen
      Throws:
      ScreenNotFoundException - if the screen is not found

    • getTimeTable

      @GetMapping(path="/timeTable/search/id/{id}", produces="application/json") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<TimeTable> getTimeTable(@PathVariable int id) throws TimeTableNotFoundException
      End point for retrieving a timetable by ID. Example URL: http://localhost:8880/timeTable/search/id/{id}
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the timetable
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the matching timetable
      Throws:
      TimeTableNotFoundException - if the timetable is not found

    • getTimeTableByShowId

      @GetMapping(path="/timeTable/search/show/id/{id}", produces="application/json") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<TimeTable> getTimeTableByShowId(@PathVariable int id)
      End point for retrieving a timetable by show ID. Example URL: http://localhost:8880/timeTable/search/show/id/{id}
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the show
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the matching timetable

    • removetimeTableById

      @DeleteMapping(path="/admin/timeTable/remove/id/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> removetimeTableById(@PathVariable int id)
      End point for removing a timetable by ID. Example URL: http://localhost:8880/admin/timeTable/remove/id/{id}
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the timetable to remove
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with a success message
